naturecounts 0.3.0.9000

Find country, state/province, subnational2, IBA, or BCR codes

Source: R/search.R
search_region.Rd

Search for the correct codes to identify countries, states/provinces, subnational2 areas, Important Bird Areas (IBA), or Bird Conservation Regions (BCR). These are then used in the nc_data_dl() and nc_count() functions.

search_region(name = NULL, type = "country")

Arguments

name

Character. The location name to search for

type

Character. One of "country", "statprov", "subnational2", "iba", or "bcr". The type of information to return.

Value

A data frame with the relevant codes and other information

Details

region_search() is deprecated in favour of search_region()

Examples


search_region("Mexico", type = "country")   # MX
#> # A tibble: 1 × 3
#>   country_code country_name country_name_fr
#>   <chr>        <chr>        <chr>          
#> 1 MX           Mexico       Mexique        

search_region("Yucatan", type = "statprov") # Yucatán
#> # A tibble: 1 × 5
#>   country_code statprov_code statprov_name_es statprov_name statprov_name_fr
#>   <chr>        <chr>         <chr>            <chr>         <chr>           
#> 1 MX           YP            Yucatán          Yucatán       Yucatán         
search_region("Alberta", type = "statprov") # AB
#> # A tibble: 1 × 5
#>   country_code statprov_code statprov_name_es statprov_name statprov_name_fr
#>   <chr>        <chr>         <chr>            <chr>         <chr>           
#> 1 CA           AB            Alberta          Alberta       Alberta         

search_region("Edmonton", type = "subnational2") # CA.AB.11
#> # A tibble: 1 × 5
#>   country_code statprov_code subnational2_code subnational2_name         ebird…¹
#>   <chr>        <chr>         <chr>             <chr>                     <chr>  
#> 1 CA           AB            CA.AB.11          Division No. 11 - Edmont… CA-AB-…
#> # … with abbreviated variable name ¹​ebird_code
search_region("Brandon", type = "subnational2")  # CA.MB.07
#> # A tibble: 1 × 5
#>   country_code statprov_code subnational2_code subnational2_name         ebird…¹
#>   <chr>        <chr>         <chr>             <chr>                     <chr>  
#> 1 CA           MB            CA.MB.07          Division No. 7 - Brandon… CA-MB-…
#> # … with abbreviated variable name ¹​ebird_code

search_region("hays reservoir", type = "iba") # AB075
#> # A tibble: 1 × 13
#>   iba_site iba_n…¹ latit…² statp…³ area_ha alt_min iba_n…⁴ neare…⁵ bcr   ncc_r…⁶
#>   <chr>    <chr>     <dbl> <chr>     <dbl>   <dbl> <chr>   <chr>   <chr> <chr>  
#> 1 AB075    Hays R…    50.1 AB         8.99     785 Hays R… Hays    11    26     
#> # … with 3 more variables: alt_max <dbl>, longitude <dbl>, status <chr>, and
#> #   abbreviated variable names ¹​iba_name_fr, ²​latitude, ³​statprov, ⁴​iba_name,
#> #   ⁵​nearest_town, ⁶​ncc_region
search_region("rainforest", type = "bcr")     # 5
#> # A tibble: 1 × 4
#>     bcr bcr_name                    bcr_name_es                        bcr_nam…¹
#>   <int> <chr>                       <chr>                              <chr>    
#> 1     5 Northern Pacific Rainforest Bosque Lluvioso del Pacífico Norte Forêts p…
#> # … with abbreviated variable name ¹​bcr_name_fr


# Show all codes
search_region(type = "country")
#> # A tibble: 39 × 3
#>    country_code country_name country_name_fr
#>    <chr>        <chr>        <chr>          
#>  1 AQ           Antarctica   Antarctique    
#>  2 AR           Argentina    Argentine

#> 10 CO           Colombia     Colombie

# \donttest{
# Using the codes
nc_count(region = list(statprov = "AB"), years = 2010)
#> Without a username, using 'show = "all"'
